name: [PROJECT] Flappy Battle
description:
My experiments with the Unreal Engine where I try to create a fighting game on mobile devices. This game utilizes touch taps to make your character "flap", similar to "Flappy Bird", but you can also swipe to fling your character. The goal of this fighting game is to knock your opponents into walls, inflicting damage upon them, and be the last character standing.

Currently, this game will only work on Android devices. Because this project is canceled, expect glitches and other weird unexpected things
